analysis.description:
McFlyCrowd.closeWindow (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#1003-1008) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- wallet.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#1007-1008)

Reentrancy in McFlyCrowd.McFlyCrowd (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#685-775):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(preMcFlyWallet,_preMcFly) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#737-739)
	- token.allowTransfer(preMcFlyWallet) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#741-743)
	- token.mint(wavesAgent,wavesTokens) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#745-746)
	- token.allowTransfer(wavesAgent) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#750-751)
	- token.allowTransfer(wavesGW) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#751)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdTokensTLP2 (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#753)

Reentrancy in McFlyCrowd.fundMinting (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#884-893):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(token.totalSupply().add(amount) <= hardCapInTokens) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#891-892)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- fundTotalSupply (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#892)
price in McFlyCrowd.calcAmountAt (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#905) is a local variable never initialiazed

McFlyCrowd.McFlyCrowd (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#685-775) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(preMcFlyWallet,_preMcFly) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#737-739)
	-token.mint(wavesAgent,wavesTokens) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#745-746)
	-token.mint(this,_teamTokens) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#754)
	-token.mint(bountyOnlineWallet,_bountyOnlineTokens) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#759)
	-token.mint(bountyOfflineWallet,_bountyOfflineTokens) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#762-763)
	-token.mint(this,_advisoryTokens) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#769)
	-token.mint(this,_reservedTokens) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#771)
	-token.mint(airdropWallet,_airdropTokens) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#771-772)

McFlyCrowd.fundMinting (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#884-893) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(to,amount) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#893)

McFlyCrowd.getTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#951-1000) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(contributor,amount) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#966-967)

McFlyCrowd.sendTokensWindow (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#1012-1040) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_tempAddr,_tokenToSend) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#1035-1036)

McFlyCrowd.finishCrowd (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#1052-1064) does not use the value returned by external calls:

	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#1062-1064)

McFlyCrowd.vestingWithdraw (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#1076-1095) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(withdrawWallet,tokenAvailable) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol)

McFlyCrowd.sendTokensWindow has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.transfer(_tempAddr,_tokenToSend) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#1035-1036)

Reentrancy in McFlyCrowd.McFlyCrowd (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#685-775):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(preMcFlyWallet,_preMcFly) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#737-739)
	- token.allowTransfer(preMcFlyWallet) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#741-743)
	State variables written after the call(s):

Reentrancy in McFlyCrowd.finishCrowd (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#1052-1064):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(now > (sT2.add(dTLP2)) || hardCapInTokens == token.totalSupply()) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#1054-1056)
	- require(bool)(! token.mintingFinished()) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#1056)
	- token.mint(this,_tokenPerWindow.mul(5)) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#1058-1060)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- ww (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#1062)

Reentrancy in McFlyCrowd.getTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#951-1000):
	External calls:
	- (amount,oddEthers) = calcAmountAt(msg.value,_at,token.totalSupply()) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#961-963)
	- require(bool)(amount.add(token.totalSupply()) <= hardCapInTokens) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#963-964)
	- token.mint(contributor,amount) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#966-967)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- counter_in (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#968-973)
	- crowdTokensTLP2 (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#973-974)

McFlyCrowd.McFlyCrowd (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#685-775) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_startTimeTLP2 >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#702-704)

McFlyCrowd.setStartEndTimeTLP (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#868-878) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp < _at) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#876)
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp < sT2) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#874)

McFlyCrowd.fundMinting (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#884-893) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp < sT2) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#889-890)

McFlyCrowd.calcAmountAt (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#898-944) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- at >= sT2 && at <= (sT2 + dTLP2) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#905-936)
	- at <= sT2 + 6480000 (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#921-935)
	- at <= sT2 + 10195200 (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#929-935)
	- at <= sT2 + 1296000 (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#907-935)
	- at <= sT2 + 2592000 (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#908-935)
	- at <= sT2 + 7776000 (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#924-935)
	- at <= sT2 + 3888000 (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#914-935)
	- at <= sT2 + 9072000 (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#925-935)
	- at <= sT2 + 5184000 (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#916-935)

McFlyCrowd.getTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#951-1000) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(amount.add(token.totalSupply()) <= hardCapInTokens) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#963-964)
	- require(bool)(oddEthers < msg.value) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#976)
	- oddEthers > 0 (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#974-980)

McFlyCrowd.closeWindow (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#1003-1008) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(ww[_winNum].active) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#1005)

McFlyCrowd.sendTokensWindow (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#1012-1040) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(ww[_winNum].totalEthInWindow > 0) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#1021-1022)
	- require(bool)(ww[_winNum].totalTransCnt > 0) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#1023-1027)
	- require(bool)(ww[_winNum].active) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#1021)
	- index < ww[_winNum].totalTransCnt && msg.gas > 100000 (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#1031-1038)

McFlyCrowd.vestingWithdraw (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#1076-1095) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- currentPeriod > VestingPeriodsCount (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol#1090-1092)
	- require(bool)((withdrawTotalSupply.add(tokenAvailable)) <= withdrawTokens) (/unique_chucks/2/0x17e2c574cf092950ef89fb4939c97db2086e796f.sol)
